----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250

]]
 _
This is the 4th entry into my specialized Art Piece Wallpaper series. This was made as an art exchange for my giftee, the great Fishish. The prompt was an artwork of 6427 or something thalassophobia related. I decided to combine the two by artistically increasing the size of the anomaly, which was 3 meters in the article, to achieve both effects. 
> Read the original article for the full experience: [[footnote]]Do it now.[[/footnote]]
> SCP-6427 â€” Night Hour Crunch
> Written by:  Fishish
> Link: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6427

Animated Live Wallpaper [[[https://youtu.be/2C2S77phkPA | HERE]]]
